name: Wizard
shortDescription: Scholars of the arcane who master magic through study, preparation, and intellect.
description: Wizards are supreme spellcasters who unravel the mysteries of magic through rigorous study. Their power comes from spellbooks, preparation, and deep arcane knowledge.

spellcasting.description: Wizards prepare spells from their spellbooks, using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast wizard spells using Intelligence.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: Once per day after a short rest, you recover expended spell slots.
